alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 3:24PM CDT until July 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marshall County in central Illinois... Northeastern Woodford County in central Illinois... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minonk, or 13 miles northeast of Eureka, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Minonk around 340 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 39 between mile markers 21 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
